23–24 0.95504888816
24–25 0.96315291667



connectivity sphere color coding
by depth öö

1. take one connection

2. add the 2 y coordinates of their start and end regions and divide by two

3. do that for all your connections

4. sort the list from large to small

5. divide the list in as many groups as wool colours you have

6. use red for the largest, blue for the smallest, other colours in between

So, eg. the more posterior part in red. ..
